body: Welcome to DEF CON 30 CTF Qualifiers!
gj PPP on getting "same old" first
Aye mateys, row on down to Smuggler's Cove…
The Duck solved BIOS from quals.
The Duck solved Hash It from quals.
We heard your prayers and said let there be crypto in DEF CON CTF. But of course what good is crypto without pwn? Crypto Chall now unlocked
We heard your prayers and said let there be crypto in DEF CON CTF. But of course what good is crypto without pwn? Crypto Chall now unlocked
Congratulations perfect r✪✪✪t on popping smuggler's cove!
you wanted web? well, we've got it! discoteq is here - good luck!
Based on how long you're all taking to solve our challenges, it seems you're a little rusty. We've got just the thing for that - constricted has been unlocked!
PPP solved Crypto Chall from quals.
AlmaFA solved not-so-advanced from quals.
Congratulations The Duck for getting constricted! Or un-constricted from constricted. Something :)
can you help us with this pretty random function?
there are just way too many secrets in this CTF (this is a double challenge release!)
there has been an update to the ncuts challenge, please see the updated scoreboard entry for details and a new download
we know CTFs can sometimes be teedious when there isn't enough to work on, so we've unlocked a new challenge for everyone - enjoy!
a dev option was deployed to production and prevented tickets from working on the new challenge - this has now been fixed
Thanks to The Duck, Pretty Random Function is now Broken!
Secrecy challenge text altered for clarification. Provide a validation code to the scoreboard.
All the new and exciting architectures for ncuts getting you down? Come kick it old school, when computers were much simpler!
perfect r✪✪✪t has first blooded secrecy!
Looks like perfect r✪✪✪t is the first to shed some light on Too Many Secrets!
you asked, we delivered - check out our new web challenge!
perfect r✪✪✪t solved router-ni from quals.
> Welcome to the last twelve hours of @defcon CTF Qualifiers! It might seem like an ocean of time, but our journey can’t last forever.
we've added some additional endpoints for the router challenge - please try a different port if you're having performance issues
Secrecy update! If you think you had a right answer but scoreboard said "no" before now, try again now.
how well do you solve mazes? let's find out!
We've removed two locked challenges from the scoreboard.
last challenge released! be careful for what you wish for...
Congratulations Katzebin for solving router-niii!
gameboard note: "Hot challenge! Solve this to unlock more." will not actually unlock more, we just want to make it real obvious which ones haven't been solved yet :)
Congratulations perfect r✪✪✪t for rooting out router-nii!
There are four hours left in DEF CON CTF Qualifiers! Lots of hacking still to be done, good luck!
Water Paddler solved ncuts from quals.
ENOENTHUSIASM solved adamd from quals.
Tick Tock… three hours left!
Two hours! 120 short minutes to get those flags in!
Shellphish solved Teedium Wallet from quals.
Just one more hour! Good luck!
Ten minutes of @defcon CTF Qualifiers remain! Get those solves in!
Thanks to every competitor for playing @defcon CTF Qualifiers 2022!
